episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch00:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] was
walking along a mountain path, when...
Heeeeeey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] spotted Iris, who was waving at [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ]
from higher ground.
Ta-da!
*chuckle* A perfect landing!
(Look at Iris, shocked at her jump.)
Oh, don’t worry! I’m totally fine!

(Worriedly warn her that what she
did was dangerous.)
Oh, jumping from there was nothing!

I train just as hard as my Pokémon, you
know!

And I’ve gotta be in tip-top shape if I
wanna see all of Pasio!

I’m not sure if you know this, but when
Alder was Champion...

he traveled all over Unova to see how
people and Pokémon get along!
I thought I should do something similar...

so when I’m not busy with my job as
Champion, I travel around Pasio!

I’ve been trying to show everyone that
Pokémon battles are fun, even when you
don’t care about who wins or loses!

’Cause I want people and Pokémon to
get closer and closer!

But you and your Pokémon,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...

You’re such good friends! Just seeing you
together makes me feel all warm and fuzzy!

I don’t think I have anything more to teach
you, really...
Oh! I know!

Would you like to explore Pasio together,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?

The next time we both have a day off, I’d
love for you to join me!
You will?! Thanks a bunch!
That’s a promise!

[Name:PlayerNickname ] and Iris went
exploring all around Pasio.

Well, it’s gotten pretty dark, so let’s make
this our last stop!
Actually...

This is a super-secret hideout—only I know
about it! Watch this...
I’m heeeeere!
How’re you all doing? I brought some food!
I think these are wild Pokémon.

Yeah, I know. Pasio’s not supposed to have
any wild Pokémon...

But you know how lots of weird phenomena
have been happening lately? I think maybe
that’s why they’re here!

I’d really like to help these Pokémon return
to where they came from...

But they haven’t warmed up to people
just yet.

It’s hard to get close enough to hear what
they say or to get the Aether Foundation to
take care of them...

That’s why I’ve been caring for them myself
in secret!

The reason why Pokémon jump out is
because they want to thank people...

At least, that’s what a myth from Sinnoh
says.

But these Pokémon have been hiding like
this...

which means they’d rather not be around
us, right?

They seem interested in the relationships
between people and Pokémon here on Pasio,
though.

I think it’d be great if they could be around
people...

But if that’s not what they want, I don’t
wanna force them.

So I think it’s OK if they just wanna hang out
here for now!

Could you keep this spot a secret,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Thanks!

I knew you’d say that,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!

*chuckle* Guess it’ll be a secret between
just us!
Bye-bye! See you next time!

I’m not sure what those Pokémon’ll choose
in the end...
I just hope...

that they come to battle me one day,
alongside someone they really trust and
got stronger with!
